article_metadata.keywords: sustainable healthcare, longevity, preventive approach, teamwork, big data, social businesses, ambulance services, green chemistry, Dr Suresh Kumar, palliative care, technology, end-of-life care

og.description: Big data is nothing new to healthcare professionals. Hospitals and clinics have always kept detailed records on their patients. But as that information moves from paper to digital files, the health record is becoming a tool facilitating everything
